docs.snippet: As the legislative hundred days are now rapidly drawing to a close, we beg to ask the conscript fathers of the State, individually and collectively, whether they mean that this City shall be doomed to endure another term of DELAVAN and the cohort of...
docs.lead_paragraph: As the legislative hundred days are now rapidly drawing to a close, we beg to ask the conscript fathers of the State, individually and collectively, whether they mean that this City shall be doomed to endure another term of DELAVAN and the cohort of incompetents facetiously known as Board of Health, Health Wardens, Street Inspectors, and what not?

docs.snippet: The intelligence from Charleston looks warlike, and indicates that a collision is likely to take place at any moment. The reports which have reached there relative to the movements of the Administration have created much excitement, and the feeling...
docs.lead_paragraph: The intelligence from Charleston looks warlike, and indicates that a collision is likely to take place at any moment. The reports which have reached there relative to the movements of the Administration have created much excitement, and the feeling appears to be general that war is inevitable within a short time. Gen. BEAUREGARD, who yesterday morning

docs.snippet: The bill to make the acts of the Commitee of Arbitration of the Chamber of Commerce binding, was reported favorably.
docs.lead_paragraph: The bill to make the acts of the Commitee of Arbitration of the Chamber of Commerce binding, was reported favorably.

headline.main: FROM THE STATE CAPITAL.; More Fillbustering in the Assembly Kings County Legislation Ahead-Metropolitan Health Bill on its Passage John M. Nelson before the Bar of the House Another Investigating Committee No License Amendment Passed Contract Confirmations Three Cent Fare Milk Freight Bill.

docs.lead_paragraph: The filibustering spirit that pervaded the Assembly, yesterday, and which has centered all interest in this House, the Senate being seldom visited except by those immediately interested in its proceedings, broke loose again, last evening, in the insane attempts of some twenty or thirty members to obtain unanimous consent. In thin way about an hour additional to the two so passed in the morning session, was used up.

docs.snippet: Mr. TOWNSEND introduced a resolution requiring the sergeant-at Arms to report what means have been taken! by him to secure the attendance of JOHN M. NELSON, Assistant District-Attorney for Albany County, at the bar of the House to answer certain...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. TOWNSEND introduced a resolution requiring the sergeant-at Arms to report what means have been taken! by him to secure the attendance of JOHN M. NELSON, Assistant District-Attorney for Albany County, at the bar of the House to answer certain charges Adopted.

headline.main: FROM THE STATE CAPITAL.; Expediting Business A Transcript of an Hour of Legislation Bribery Case Assessment Bureau Metropolitan Health Bill Swill-Milk.Bill Fillbustering.

docs.lead_paragraph: "Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to offer the following resolution." A page hurries up to the Speaker's desk, bearing the important document. The Speaker saps, "The gentleman from asks unanimous consent to offer the following resolution. It will be read for information." The Clerk reads. The Speaker proceeds "This resolution requires unanimous consent are there any objections?"

docs.snippet: The telegraph tells us that President LINCOLN is sick. We do not doubt it. He has cause to be sick. It will be a miracle if, in six months, he is not either dead or dazed.
docs.lead_paragraph: The telegraph tells us that President LINCOLN is sick. We do not doubt it. He has cause to be sick. It will be a miracle if, in six months, he is not either dead or dazed.

headline.main: Washington's Birthday in Turkey.; CELEBRATION OF THE ANNIVERSARY BY THE UNITED STATES MINISTER.

docs.lead_paragraph: A correspondent, writing from Constantinople under date of Feb. 27, gives an account of the manner in which Washington's Birthday was celebrated is that city. Such of the American residents, or sojourners, as chose to do so, accepted invitations to call on Col. JAMES WILLIAMS, the United States Minister, during the day, and in the evening that gentleman
